channel.title: Home on tpongo
channel.description: Recent content in Home on tpongo

item.title: Moving back to Hungary from China
item.description: It’s been a long time since I haven’t posted here, so I will make a short update here. I moved back to Europe, Hungary this month, so I want to write about some of the reverse culture shocks I experienced, the things that were new to me, OpenStreetMap and my planning of the Camino de Santiago.

item.title: One month of Youtube
item.description: As a first post I thought to share my Youtube watching experiences from last month. To be honest I think 80% of it is thrash looking at it in retrospect, but there are definitely some that I find invaluable. I will mostly cover Youtube videos from content creaters that I follow, not just randomly clicked on from my feed.
